name: Arm of Satan
description:
A downloadable demo for Windows PC.

Wrongly sentenced to Hell, Girl is given an unexpected hand in her search for salvation.

ARM OF SATAN is a hard and fast co-op 2D-platformer forged from a love of old school platformers, cooperative multiplayer and dark graphic novels.

Arm of Satan is EXCLUSIVELY 2-PLAYER, ASYMMETRIC CO-OP and LOCAL MULTIPLAYER.

One player controls Girl, the other controls her Satanic Arm.... both players must synchronise to master difficult platforming and navigate hellish hazards in a ferociously frantic and dangerous hellscape.

The built-in level timer and leaderboard throws down the gauntlet for co-op speedrunners. You think you have had a speedrun experience like this before? Think again.

The current build requires 2 controllers to play and runs on Windows PC.

Join our community Discord to keep up to date with the development of the game: https://discord.gg/WnwzH3rsgY

We aim to release on Steam mid-2023!

{Currently in development!}
